Business Profile for Ossian, Indiana
Login: Password: Business Search 14 Million Businesses in 12,000 Categories Search for: Localization:
Business name: Crane's Drive-In, Inc. Address: 410 North Jefferson St
Ossian, Indiana 46777 Phone number: 260-622-7458 Fax number: 260-622-4418 Map: please wait while loading the map... Directions to this business View: Email address: Category: Dining Description: Crane's Drive-In, Inc. is a fifties style outdoor fast-food restaurant with drive-up eat in you car service or you can park and use the picnic tables for outdoor dining. They still have carhops who bring the food to your car or table. Crane's in known for: Homemade Breaded Tenderloins and Broasted Chicken including homemade Soft Ice-Cream. Rootbeer still served in chilled glass mugs. Over 85 Items on menu. Prices reasonable. Open April thru October each year. Accept call-in go-orders for pick-up. Credit Cards accepted.
Call: 260-622-7458 Photos:
Last update: 2007-02-19 Visits: 1511
